OtherText.val: Non-Pathology Findings (see Notes J and K)

ListItem.title: Urinary 17-ketosteroids increased (10 mg / g creatinine / 24 hours)

Section.title: Additional dimensions (repeat section if more than one part)
Additional dimensions (repeat section if more than one part)

Question.title: Treatment Effect (applicable to carcinomas treated with neoadjuvant therapy)

DisplayedItem.title: Note: There is no category of carcinoma in situ (pTis) relative to carcinomas of the adrenal gland.

ListItem.title: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor
pT1: Tumor 5 cm or less in greatest dimension, no extra-adrenal invasion
pT2: Tumor greater than 5 cm, no extra-adrenal invasion
pT3: Tumor of any size with local invasion, but not invading adjacent organs#

OtherText.val: #Adjacent organs include kidney, diaphragm, great vessels, pancreas, and liver.

ListItem.title: pT4: Tumor of any size with invasion of adjacent organs#
pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis

OtherText.val: Status of Regional of Lymph Nodes
